name: Mankato Web Design
description:
With a passion for the web and a flair for delivering revenue-generating results to clients, Mankato is more than a company; it's a multi-disciplined team of 20 individuals. Mankato's team is made up of designers, developers, and social media marketers, all of whom work together with each other as well as  the management team on a daily basis.
This close relationship is maintained through scheduled project review meetings, the purpose of which is to ensure that Mankato is delivering quick answers and revenue-generating results.
READ MORE...
